design_philosophy.vibe: Old Money Modern. Precise, warm, authoritative, and uncluttered.
design_philosophy.core_principle: Data as Art. Even a simple list of leads should feel like a guest list for a gala.

usage.headings: Use Playfair Display for all h1, h2, h3. Weight: 600 or 700. Tracking: tight.
usage.body: Use Manrope for all standard text. Weight: 400. Leading: relaxed.
usage.labels: Use Manrope Uppercase for table headers and form labels. Tracking: wide (0.05em). Weight: 600.

primary.usage: Main buttons, active states, sidebar background, brand accents

card.usage: Table containers, cards, form backgrounds (Floral White)

general.spacing: Generous. Use p-8 or p-12 for main containers. Avoid cramped lists.
general.radius: Sharp edges (0px or 2px) to match the 'Brutalist/Lux' vibe. No rounded-xl.

public_leads.structure: Single column, elegant header. Table is the hero. Use a 'Paper' texture or subtle border.
public_leads.header: Centered, Serif, large (text-5xl). Subtitle in Sans.
public_leads.table: Minimalist. No vertical borders. Bold bottom border on headers. Row hover: subtle beige darken.

admin_login.left: Deep Maroon background with the architectural image overlay (multiply blend mode).
admin_login.right: Beige background, centered form. Clean, sharp inputs.

dashboard.sidebar: Fixed left, width 280px. Background: Deep Maroon. Text: White/Beige.
dashboard.widgets: Stats cards at top (Total Leads, Today's Leads). Main table below.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90. Sharp corners (rounded-none or rounded-sm). Uppercase labels.
buttons.secondary: border border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary/10. Sharp corners.

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-b-2 border-primary/20 focus:border-primary px-0 rounded-none. transition-colors. (Material/Underline style)
inputs.alt_style: Standard shadcn input but with sharp corners and border-primary/30.

table.style: text-base. Header: uppercase, tracking-widest, text-xs, font-bold, text-primary/70. Rows: py-4.

images.description: Abstract beige architectural curve for the login page sidebar.

assets.icons: Use Lucide React. Thin stroke (1.5px). Color: Primary or Muted Foreground.

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use gradients. Solid, rich colors only.
Do NOT use rounded corners larger than 4px. We want sharp, professional lines.
Ensure high contrast for text (Dark Charcoal on Beige).
All dates must be formatted cleanly (e.g., 'Oct 12, 2023' not '10/12/2023').
Loading states: Use a skeleton loader that matches the beige theme (darker beige pulse).
instructions_to_main_agent: 2. Update tailwind.config.js to extend the theme with our colors.
3. Update index.css with the CSS variables provided.
4. Build the 'Public Leads' page first as a read-only interface.
6. Build the 'Admin Dashboard' with the Add Lead form.
7. Mock the Google Apps Script API calls initially to ensure UI works before integration.
8. Use 'sonner' for toast notifications on success/failure.
